If more than used for antisensitivity toothpaste brushing is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Directions Uses aids in the prevention of cavities helps prevent gingivitis ⚫helps interfere with the harmful effects of plaque associated with gingivitis ⚫helps control plaque bacteria that contribute to the development of gingivitis • builds increasing protection against painful sensitivity of the teeth to cold, heat, acids, sweets or contact Warnings When using this product do not use for sensitivity longer than four weeks unless recommended by a dentist. Stop use and ask a dentist if the sensitivity problem persists or worsens. Sensitive teeth may indicate a adults and children 12 yrs. of age & older: apply at least a 1-inch strip of the product onto a soft bristle toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly for at least 1 minute twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist. Make sure to brush all sensitive areas of the teeth. ⚫ do not swallow children under 12 yrs. of age: ask a dentist Other information ⚫products containing stannous fluoride may produce surface staining of the teeth ⚫adequate toothbrushing may prevent these stains which are not harmful or permanent and may be Drug Facts (continued) removed by your dentist this Crest is specially formulated to help prevent staining see your dentist regularly Inactive ingredients glycerin, hydrated silica, sodium hexametaphosphate, propylene glycol, PEG-6, water, zinc lactate, flavor, sodium lauryl sulfate, sodium gluconate, sodium saccharin, trisodium phosphate, xanthan gum, PVP, carrageenan, cocamidopropyl betaine, titanium dioxide, blue 1 Questions? 1-800-594-4158 *Clinically proven on plaque, gingivitis, and sensitivity benefits **Protects against plaque bacteria that lead to gingivitis with twice daily brushing *Helps prevent plaque bacteria that can cause gingivitis; among Stannous Fluoride toothpastes vs Sodium Fluoride; With Twice Daily Brushing DISTR. column32: indications: arm & hammertm sensitive provides maximum relief from painful tooth & nerve sensitivity due to cold, heat, acids, sweets or contact. a decrease in sensitivity should occur within the first 2 weeks of regular brushing and improve with continued use. aids in the prevention of dental decay. directions: recommended for adults and children over 12. brush teeth thoroughly after meals or at least twice a day. consult your dentist about tooth sensitivity. adults and children over 12 years: cover toothbrush with the toothpaste. caution: do not swallow. keep out of reach of children. if more than used for brushing is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control centre right away. consult your dentist if symptoms persist or worsen. indications: arm & hammermc sensitive procure un soulagement maximal de la douleur dentaire et de la sensibilité nerveuse dues au froid, à la chaleur, aux acides, aux sucres ou au contact. son action se fait sentir dès les deux premières semaines de brossage régulier et s'intensifie avec un usage continu. il aide aussi à prévenir la carie. mode d'emploi : recommandé pour les adultes et les enfants de plus de 12 ans. se brosser soigneusement les dents après les repas ou au moins deux fois par jour. consulter un dentiste au sujet de la sensibilité des dents. adultes et enfants de plus de 12 ans : couvrir la brosse à dents de dentifrice. mise en garde: ne pas avaler. garder hors de la portée des enfants. en cas d'ingestion d'une quantité supérieure à celle d'un brossage, appeler un médecin ou un centre antipoison immédiatement. consulter un dentiste si les symptômes persistent au s'aggravent. medicinal ingredients/ingrédients medicinaux: fluoride 0.11% w/w (as sodium fluoride 0.243% w/w), potassium nitrate 5.0% w/w/fluorure 0,11 % p/p (sous forme de fluorure de sodium 0,23% p/p) nitrate de potassium 5,0 % p/p non-medicinal ingredients/ingrédients non-médicinaux: aqua, aroma, cellulose gum,
